name: Motorola S19 File Record
summary: Learn about .S19 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Each line in an S19 file consists of one record. Every record begins with the letter "S," followed by a "1" if the record contains data or a "9" if it is the last record in the file.

description: Contains low-level machine code and addresses of a compiled C or Assembly program; saved in a text format that represents hexadecimal coded binary data; used by the Freescale series of microcontrollers.
